content.content: Forum at a Glance! The one-stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk, and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm.  Three-Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  Revenue down, but morale is up. The recent rates change is targeting more DAI creation outside of stablecoin facilities. Over 6M DAI worth of Collateral was successfully liquidated last week without any loss events for Maker. While still, in an impressive range, the slippage for trading DAI has increased in the last couple weeks, with slippage trades below 30,000 DAI at or above 0.1%    ICYMI - Announcements  A Post-Mortem was released for the change in parameters on the New Silver RWA Vault. Initial Flash Mint Module Parameters were released, pending passage of last week’s executive spell.    Active Discussions  ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ A Framework for Real-World Assets - @juan points to the need for a framework when evaluating and onboarding Real-World Assets to the Maker Protocol. Some thoughts on Liquity - @LongForWisdom takes a deep dive into the Liquidity Protocol to evaluate the potential of LUSD in a PSM facility. [Insert wisdom pun here.] Maker will thrive in the bear market… If we can keep calm and carry on - @Replenish2030 shares some reflections on Governance stability through turbulent market conditions.   Seeking Consensus  ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ [Signal Request] Adjusting ttl(bid-duration) on flap-auctions - Signal Extended - Make sure to cast your vote in @ultraschuppi’s signal to decrease the auction time on surplus auctions. The signal was been extended until July 8th. [Signal Request] Raise SF On RWA When Issuers Unilaterally Change Terms - @PaperImperium throws up his first signal, asking the community if they would like to implement an automatic rates hike when DROP agreements are changed without input from Maker. [Signal Request] Shorten the PPG process - @alexis signals the community on shortening the time for Parameter Proposal Groups (PPGs) to have their recommendations voted on by the community.   Ongoing Initiatives  ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!   Help Wanted  ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Governance Contributors for GovAlpha - @LongForWisdom puts out the call for new team members! Different tracks available depending on interest and time commitment. Applicants are asked to contribute at least 8 hours a week. Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase
This topic was automatically closed 14 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Forum at a Glance! The one-stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk, and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm.  Three-Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  The peg holds as more USDC flows in through the PSM (Peg Stability Module), currently topping $2.5B We’ve spent a full week above 5B DAI in circulation! DAI Liquidity is quite strong, with slippage rates under 5 basis points for trades above 10,000 DAI. Historic slippage showing strength as well:  1621×603 34.9 KB      ICYMI - Announcements  The Risk Core Unit announced even more features on the Maker Risk Dashboard, features include more auction statistics, loan loss simulations, and a Risk Core Unit forum archive. We still need some help passing the weekly executive, in the words of @LongForWisdom “Vote 'em if you got 'em”      Active Discussions  ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’ Real World Assets May Report - An update on the state of RWA has caused quite the stir in the community. There’s a lot to learn in this thread, but a reminder to engage assuming good faith and in the spirit of collaboration. What is stopping us from investing the PSM USDC? - A discussion on deploying the USDC capital from the USDC-PSM-A facility, I recommend checking out a prior post on Balance Sheet Manipulation as well. [Informal Poll] Marketing Maker - @Planet_X brings forward some questions on the state of marketing at MakerDAO, and a discussion on how we can coordinate our efforts between Core Units.   Seeking Consensus  ‘Yo, do you even signal?’ [Signal Request] tin/tout parameters for new PSMs - @ultraschuppi follows up on a previous Signal, asking the community if they support the Open Market Committee making decisions on the tin and tout (Fee in and out) for incoming PSM vault types, while asking the community for their input on the initial Debt Ceilings. [Signal Request] Adjusting ttl on flap-auctions - @ultraschuppi back at it with the signal plans . Here proposing a change in the duration to surplus auctions, Signal ends June 24th.   Ongoing Initiatives  ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance!   Help Wanted  ‘Oh %#$?, we need a doodad, and we need it now.’ Wanted: Risk Domain Monitoring Tools  - @Primoz puts out a call for additional support to produce monitoring tools for the risk team. Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available. We could always use help reviewing MIPs in the Request for Comment phase

Forum at a Glance! The one-stop shop for finding out what’s being discussed by governance right now. Links reflect my view of the most noteworthy activity in the governance, risk and oracles categories right now. Disagree? Think something should be added? Leave a reply or a pm.  Three Point Summary ‘What do I need to know as an MKR Holder this week?’  Global Debt Ceiling was increased by 500 million Dai. In the same vote, Core Unit Budget Distribution for June was approved; a collective sum of 1,543,127 Dai will be distributed to seven Core Units. USDC-A, USDC-B, TUSD-A, PAXUSD-A, GUSD-A, PSM-USDC-A, UNIV2DAIUSDC-A, USDT-A vault types will be added to the Liquidations 2.0 framework, though liquidations will be disabled.    ICYMI - Announcements   Financial report - 2021-05 - Real-World Finance Core Unit Facilitator @sebventures published the financial report for May 2021.  LFW Holiday - 07/06/21 to 14/06/21 - GovAlpha Facilitator @longforwisdom is taking a week off.    Active Discussions  ‘What’s going on? You think what?! You’re 100% wrong, and here’s why…’   [Discussion] Maker Is Not A Lender; Does Not Take Deposits - An ongoing, deep-reaching discussion set off by @paperimperium.  SourceCred distribution for week ending May 30th, 2021 - The weekly report on SourceCred distribution prompted some discussion about the desirability of increasing the minimum payout amount.  Maker and L2: Avoiding Ren’s mistake - @planet_x used Ren as a sobering example of the better mousetrap fallacy and its consequences, which kicked off a discussion on how to make Maker more user-oriented.    Seeking Consensus  ‘Yo, do you even signal?’   [Signal Request] Offboard unprofitable collateral types - @ultraschuppi poses the question of whether we should offboard collateral types whose Oracles costs outweigh their collected stability fees.  [Signal Request] Adjusting ttl on flap-auctions - @ultraschuppi argues for decreasing the ttl parameter (bid duration)    Ongoing Initiatives  ‘Oh my god, this is taking ages, why can’t things be simple?’  Collateral Calls - Calling all Projects!  @juan sets up a signup thread for projects wishing to present on the bi-weekly collateral call. Know any potential collateral partners that want to present? Refer them here. Collateral Status Index - Confused about the current status of the various collateral types that have been discussed recently? Check out this post to find out the status and current position of each within the onboarding process. Weekly MIPs Updates - @Davidutro and @charlesstlouis bring the latest updates in the world of MIPs. MakerDAO Standard Governance Processes - @LongForWisdom writes a brief overview of the currently operating governance processes in the Maker community. Confused between Signals, Declarations and MIPs? Look no further. The Official Welcome Thread - A welcome and introductions thread. Not strictly speaking governance, but if anyone new or old wants to introduce themselves, now is your chance! Grants are available. Wanted: Join the Summary Team - @Davidutro asks for anyone interested in producing call summaries get in touch. Grants available.
